title: John Travolta & The BeeGees
review: The best thing About this is the music of the BeeGees and the dancing of John Travolta, and thats all, I hope that paramount will release a DVD copy of that movie for music sake.

title: All I have to say
review: The first time I saw this movie I was only 13, after that I saw many other horror movies, but none of them compares to it, it is simply the best horror movie ever made.
